Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: McLaughlin, S.A., M.F. A'Hearn, D. Deming, K.P. Klaasen, B. Carcich, D. Wellnitz, and T. Hewagama, DEEP IMPACT/EPOXI DOCUMENTATION SET V3.0, DI-C-HRII/HRIV/MRI/ITS-6-DOC-SET-V3.0, NASA Planetary Data System, 2011.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Version 3.0 of the updated collection of documentation for raw and calibrated science data sets for the Deep Impact and EPOXI missions.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set contains version 3.0 of the updated collection of documentation for the raw and calibrated science data sets for the Deep Impact and EPOXI missions. This data set supersedes version 2.0.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This data set contains version 3.0 of the updated collection of documentation for the raw and calibrated science data sets for the Deep Impact and EPOXI missions. This data set supersedes version 2.0.
This documentation set should be used when working with the following Deep Impact and EPOXI data sets:
Thermal-Vacuum -------------- TV1 : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-GROUND-TV1-V1.0 TV2 : DIF-CAL-HRII/HRIV-2-GROUND-TV2-V1.0 TV3 : DII-CAL-ITS-2-GROUND-TV3-V1.0 TV4 : DIF-CAL-HRII/HRIV/MRI-2-GROUND-TV4-V1.0
Deep Impact Flight - Science ---------------------------- HRII raw cruise cals : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 HRII raw encounter : DIF-C-HRII-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 HRII calibrated encounter : DIF-C-HRII-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0 DIF-C-HRII-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
HRIV raw cruise cals : DIF-CAL-HRIV-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 HRIV raw encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 HRIV calibrated encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0 DIF-C-HRIV-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
MRI raw cruise cals : DIF-CAL-MRI-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 MRI raw encounter : DIF-C-MRI-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 MRI calibrated encounter : DIF-C-MRI-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0 DIF-C-MRI-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
ITS raw cruise cals : DII-CAL-ITS-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 ITS raw encounter : DII-C-ITS-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 ITS calibrated encounter : DII-C-ITS-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0 DII-C-ITS-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
Instrument temps : DIF-C-HRII/HRIV/MRI-6-TEMPS-V1.0 Tempel 1 photometry : DIF-C-MRI-5-TEMPEL1-PHOTOMETRY-V1.0
Deep Impact Flight - Navigation Imaging --------------------------------------- HRII raw cruise cals : DIF-CAL-HRIV-2-NAV-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 HRII raw encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-2-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 HRII calibrated encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-3-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
MRI raw cruise cals : DIF-CAL-MRI-2-NAV-9P-CRUISE-V1.1 MRI raw encounter : DIF-C-MRI-2-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.1 MRI calibrated encounter : DIF-C-MRI-3-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.1
ITS raw cruise cals : DII-CAL-ITS-2-NAV-9P-CRUISE-V1.1 ITS raw encounter : DII-C-ITS-2-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.1 ITS calibrated encounter : DII-C-ITS-3-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
EPOXI Flight - Science ---------------------- HRII raw cals : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-EPOXI-CALIBRATIONS-V2.0 HRIV raw cals : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-EPOXI-CALIBRATIONS-V2.0 MRI raw cals : DIF-CAL-MRI-2-EPOXI-CALIBRATIONS-V2.0
HRII raw Earth : DIF-E-HRII-2-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 HRII calibrated Earth : DIF-E-HRII-3/4-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 HRIV raw Earth : DIF-E-HRIV-2-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 HRIV calibrated Earth : DIF-E-HRIV-3/4-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 MRI raw Earth : DIF-E-MRI-2-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 MRI calibrated Earth : DIF-E-MRI-3/4-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0
HRII raw Mars : DIF-M-HRII-2-EPOXI-MARS-V1.0 HRII calibrated Mars : DIF-M-HRII-3/4-EPOXI-MARS-V1.0 HRIV raw Mars : DIF-M-HRIV-2-EPOXI-MARS-V1.0 HRIV calibrated Mars : DIF-M-HRIV-3/4-EPOXI-MARS-V1.0 MRI raw Mars : DIF-M-MRI-2-EPOXI-MARS-V1.0 MRI calibrated Mars : DIF-M-MRI-3/4-EPOXI-MARS-V1.0
HRIV raw exoplanet transits : DIF-X-HRIV-2-EPOXI-EXOPLANETS-V1.0 HRIV calib. exo. transits : DIF-X-HRIV-3/4-EPOXI-EXOPLANETS-V1.0 HRIV transit photometry : DIF-X-HRIV-5-EPOXI-EXOPLANETS-PHOT-V1.0
HRII raw Hartley2 : DIF-C-HRII-2-EPOXI-HARTLEY2-V1.0 HRII calibrated Hartley2 : DIF-C-HRII-3/4-EPOXI-HARTLEY2-V1.0 HRIV raw Hartley2 : DIF-C-HRIV-2-EPOXI-HARTLEY2-V1.0 HRIV calibrated Hartley2 : DIF-C-HRIV-3/4-EPOXI-HARTLEY2-V1.0 MRI raw Hartley2 : DIF-C-MRI-2-EPOXI-HARTLEY2-V1.0 MRI calibrated Hartley2 : DIF-C-MRI-3/4-EPOXI-HARTLEY2-V1.0
Instrument Temps : DIF-CAL-HRII/HRIV/MRI-6-EPOXI-TEMPS-V2.0
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview ========================= The documentation in this dataset was prepared, used, and internally checked by the science, navigation, data center, and archive teams for the Deep Impact and EPOXI projects.
Review ====== Earlier, partial versions of this dataset for Deep Impact passed PDS peer reviews held during 2006. The final, full version 1.0 of this data set for Deep Impact was reviewed in April 2007 and was accepted for the PDS archive pending resolution of liens (that were completed in December 2007). Version 1.0 only contained documentation for Deep Impact datasets.
The first combined documentation collection for Deep Impact and EPOXI, version 2.0, passed a peer review held by SBN on 23 July 2009 and was archived at the PDS Small Bodies Node (SBN) and the Multi-Mission Archive at STScI (MAST). Version 2.0 included documentation for EPOXI calibration and EPOCh data acquired from October 2007, the start of the EPOXI mission, through December 2008, the end of the primary observations for EPOCh.
Version 3.0 is expected to be the final version of the documentation collection for the Deep Impact and EPOXI science data archives at PDS. Version 3.0 includes documentation for EPOXI calibration, additional EPOCh Earth and Mars, and DIXI/Hartley 2 Encounter data acquired from January 2009 to the end of the EPOXI mission in February 2011. Version 3.0 was peer reviewed and certified for scientific use on 15 August 2011.
